Text: Elf bowling? Does this mean I get to toss elves down the bowling lane? Sounds fun.

If anyone get the error "ElfBowling.RWG" [it was my tiny mistake when i made installer] than here is the solution.

Point to the shortcut on the desktop and right clik it and go to properties and click on "find target" this option will take u to the program direcotry. now point to "ElfBowling.exe" and again right clikc it and send to the desktop [creat shortcut] now u can play from desktop icon.

sorry for this little mistake
BEST game I've played in a while. Funny as shyte !!! Thanks for sharing akashneo.
